algebra_1.title: Linear equations - algebra 1
algebra_1.content: A linear equation is an equation between two variables that gives a straight line when plotted. Example: 2x + 3 = 7.

quizzes.question: Which of these is a linear equation?
quizzes.explain: Linear equations contain variables to the first power only.

kinematics.title: Basic Kinematics
kinematics.content: Kinematics studies motion of objects without considering forces. v = u + at, s = ut + 0.5at^2.

quizzes.question: If u=0, a=2 m/s^2 and t=3s, what's v?
